'''1.21.93''' (Windows) or '''1.21.93.1''' (iOS), is a minor update to ''[[Minecraft Education]]'', released on October 30, 2025, which fixes some bugs.<ref name="article"/><ref>{{citation|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/39171462904980-What-s-New-in-the-Chase-the-Clouds-Update-v1-21-93-1|title=What's New in the Chase the Clouds Update v1.21.93.1|website=edusupport.minecraft.net|author=Justin}}</ref>

== Changes ==

*Updates to MakeCode:  
**Added more events.
**Code does not run automatically anymore when closing.

== Fixes ==
*Fixed switching touch controls on Android.
*Behavior and Resource Packs are correctly included in the world again when opened from My Templates.
*Fixed a login error.
